TopicTitle: KSP-KMP- Science and Reaserch development problem.

Articles.Content: My KMP runs preety decent, but i encountered one problem in the science and research department. For unknow reasons when i exit the server or someone else does and comes back, me/him doesn't have his reaserched stuff. So i was just thinking if this works for you or not, and maybe you can help me with this. I'm running KSP 0.23 and KMP 0.1.5.0 and i also have the newest client, all from spaceport.
You should post this in the main KMP thread or on the KMP bug tracker. This thread is unnecessary. Can we please get a lock, mods?
